content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.D_STReasonDetail') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.D_STReasonDetail
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.D_STReasonDetail (
	[lmds_db_reasondetail_id] int,
	[lmds_db_reasondetail_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[lmds_db_reasondetail_reasongroupid] int,
	[lmds_db_reasondetail_orv_type] int,
	[lmds_db_reasondetail_active] int,
	[lmds_db_reasondetail_actionid] int,
	[lmds_db_reasondetail_cancelreason] int,
	[lmds_db_reasondetail_lmsreasonrule] int,
	[lmds_db_reasongroup_description] nvarchar(4000),


	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/OPS/streasondetail.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.D_STReasonDetail 
GO
